articles.description: MS Dhoni’s dew assessment did not come true but the wicket did appear to be a bit difficult in the first few overs when the Sunrisers were batting and Daniel Vettori said the CSK skipper's assessment should always be backed.
articles.content: Former New Zealand captain Daniel Vettori said Chennai Super Kings captain MS Dhonis assessment of the pitch should always be backed no matter what.' Vettoris comments came after CSK beat Sunrisers H… [+2500 chars]
